thread.title: Sean Penn Seeks To Sanction Lee Daniels Over Tactics In Defamation Fight
thread.title_full: Sean Penn Seeks To Sanction Lee Daniels Over Tactics In Defamation Fight

author: Brennan Williams
title: Sean Penn Seeks To Sanction Lee Daniels Over Tactics In Defamation Fight
text:
Sean Penn Seeks To Sanction Lee Daniels Over Tactics In Defamation Fight The Hollywood Reporter Posted: 10/23/2015 11:56 AM EDT Getty 
The legal dispute between Sean Penn and Empire co-creator Lee Daniels is turning on tactics quickly. 
In September, Penn filed a $10 million lawsuit over a comment that Daniels had made to The Hollywood Reporter.
